title: Designing Educational Blogging for Reflective Learning: Application in Computer-Supported Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learners experience social issue scenarios through simulations, engage in reflective blogging, and receive continuous formative feedback

learning_goals: Learners can experience social problem scenarios presented in simulation/VR environments and organize reflective writing according to a structured blogging format.
Learners can read peers’ blogging content, provide feedback, and derive new perspectives through interaction.
Through reflective thinking activities, learners can establish practical strategies to apply knowledge acquired from simulations to real-world social problem solving.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
